title: ACL2 : FC Goa count on David Timor grit and rich experience | Goa News
body_text:
Trending
Panaji: David Timor can boast of things which many footballers can’t. Like his close to 400 appearances in the top tiers of Spanish football, his ability to play effectively in multiple positions, top-notch fitness at 35, and even a cherished win against Cristiano Ronaldo.The left-footed central midfielder has rich experience in Spanish football, which includes more than 150 games in La Liga with clubs like Valencia, Osasuna, Leganes, Girona, Las Palmas, Getafe and Huesca. It’s been an impressive career, one where he has faced the world’s best, and won.“I remember winning against Real Madrid (with Ronaldo in the team),” Timor told TOI after a training session at Bambolim on Tuesday. “It's hard to play against him, but it's not impossible to get a result. Obviously, he is a good player, but ultimately, it’s the team effort that counts and not my experience alone.“I played against him six or seven times (in LaLiga) but what's important here is that we are playing against a team where there are a lot of other high-quality players. We need to keep in mind that we are playing against Al-Nassr and not Cristiano Ronaldo.”
